abstract: Branden Grace wins RBC Heritage golf tournament in Hilton Head Island, SC; other golf news noted.

headline.print_headline: South African Rallies to Win in Hilton Head
headline.main: South African Rallies to Win in Hilton Head

snippet: Branden Grace shot a five-under-par 66 to overtake Luke Donald and win the RBC Heritage.
lead_paragraph: Branden Grace shot a five-under-par 66 to overtake Luke Donald and win the RBC Heritage.
